title: New: Resin Moon â€“ Salt
body:
More dreamy electronic pop from Australia? Yes please.

This new track from **Resin Moon** is a gorgeous composition; perfect for the oncoming summer afternoons. Check it below.

Like this? Follow our [On Repeat Playlist](https://open.spotify.com/user/crackintheroad/playlist/1UB6gJIZpmiO0H2zmSbg02) for a handpicked selection of the very best in new music; updated weekly.
